    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_fa5588e99908e05cd39c9d6ceb5b0bc38b971f90</entry>
          </identifier>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_fa5588e99908e05cd39c9d6ceb5b0bc38b971f90</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Movement of Mercury around its epicycle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung des Quecksilbers um seinen Epicycle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement de mercure autour de son épicycle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento do mercúrio em torno de seu epicycle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento di mercurio intorno al relativo 
epicycle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετακίνηση του υδραργύρου γύρω από τον επίκυκλό του</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento del mercurio alrededor de su epiciclo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the movement of Mercury around its epicycle with respect to the Earth's deferent (a) and the retrograde path of Mercury as it moves around the Earth (b).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mercury</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">planets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">epicycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">retrograde path</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht die Bewegung des 
Quecksilbers um seinen Epicycle in Bezug auf das deferent (a) der 
Masse und des rückläufigen Pfades des Quecksilbers, während es um 
die Masse (b) bewegt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre le mouvement du mercure 
autour de son épicycle en ce qui concerne le (a) déférent de la 
terre et de la voie d'accès rétrograde du mercure pendant qu'il se 
déplace autour de la terre (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra o movimento do mercúrio em
torno de seu epicycle com respeito ao (a) deferent da terra e do 
trajeto retrograde do mercúrio enquanto se move em torno da terra 
(b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra il movimento di mercurio 
intorno al relativo epicycle riguardo al (a) deferent della terra e 
del percorso retrogrado di mercurio mentre si muove intorno alla terra
(b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί τη μετακίνηση του 
υδραργύρου γύρω από τον επίκυκλό του όσον αφορά το γήινο 
deferent (α) και το οπισθοδρομικό μονοπάτι του υδραργύρου καθώς
κινείται γύρω από τη γη (β).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra el movimiento del mercurio 
alrededor de su epiciclo con respecto al (a) deferente de la tierra y 
del camino retrógrado del mercurio mientras que se mueve alrededor de
la tierra (b).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quecksilber</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Planeten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Epicycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">rückläufiger Pfad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la terre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mercure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">planètes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">épicycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">voie d'accès rétrograde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mercúrio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planetas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">epicycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">trajeto retrograde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mercurio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pianeti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">epicycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">percorso retrogrado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υδράργυρος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mercurio</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">planetas</string>

          </keyword>
